title: The Favorites - NFL Week 10 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 10 Gambling Preview
description:
After a weekend absolutely dominated by underdogs, Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network climb back into the drivers seat to preview every game on the NFL slate. Together they review the early lines they love, including intriguing matchups for the Colts, Jets and Steelers. They also climb into the foxhole with the New Orleans Saints, and play a round of Scooch Roulette.

BLT MIA - 8 MIN

WAS TB - 9 MIN

DET PIT - 11 MIN

CLE NE - 13 MIN

JAX IND - 16 MIN

ATL DAL - 19 MIN

NO TEN - 22 MIN

BUF NYJ - 25 MIN

CAR AZ - 30 MIN

PHL DEN - 36 MIN

SEA GB - 37 MIN

LV KC - 39 MIN

LAR SF - 40 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
